constantValues: The sub-national geographical identification of the target locations of an activity. These can be described by gazetteer reference, coordinates, administrative areas or a textual description.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: codeId

constantValues: Unique identifier for Non Embedded Codelist associated with Location.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier for Non Embedded Codelist associated with Location.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: deliveryFrameworkId

constantValues: Unique identifier for Delivery Framework associated with Location.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier for Delivery Framework associated with Location.

members.name: description

constantValues: A description that qualifies the location.

members.description: A description that qualifies the location.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: exactnessId

constantValues: Defines whether the location represents the most distinct point reasonably possible for this type of activity or is an approximation due to lack of more detailed information.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Defines whether the location represents the most distinct point reasonably possible for this type of activity or is an approximation due to lack of more detailed information.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: featureDesignationId

constantValues: A more refined coded classification of the type of feature referred to by this location.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: A more refined coded classification of the type of feature referred to by this location.

members.name: level

constantValues: A number defining a subdivision within a hierarchical system of administrative areas.

members.description: A number defining a subdivision within a hierarchical system of administrative areas.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: locationClassId

constantValues: Unique identifier for Non Embedded Codelist associated with Location.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier for Non Embedded Codelist associated with Location.

members.name: name

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.description: The name of the custom entity.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: parentLocationId

constantValues: Unique identifier for Location associated with Location.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier for Location associated with Location.

members.name: pos

constantValues: The latitude and longitude coordinates in the format “lat lng”

members.description: The latitude and longitude coordinates in the format “lat lng”

members.name: reference

constantValues: An internal reference that describes the location in the reporting organisation’s own system.

members.description: An internal reference that describes the location in the reporting organisation’s own system.

members.name: statusCode

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Location

definitions.description: The sub-national geographical identification of the target locations of an activity. These can be described by gazetteer reference, coordinates, administrative areas or a textual description.
